ygData.subject: Re: In Permafrost
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I m heading to Permafrost as soon as get my next level (currently 23rd). I will be seeking the Runed Circlet - a pretty nice head item for Wizards
ygData.messageBody:
Well I'm heading to Permafrost as soon as get my next level (currently 23rd).
I will be seeking the Runed Circlet - a pretty nice head item for Wizards
(rediculous that Verant made yet another Magic user specific head item look
like armor - I want my Pointy hat!!!!!). Perma has two very distinct areas -
the beginning part that lvls 15 to 30 can do well in and then the harder part
filled with Timber Wolves and Ice Giants.

Wizaro Wrathcaster
Solusek Ro
